title: Am I toxic?
body: I was playing silently all game and in the end the Vi said "We had a window to shut Yi down" And I said "If we had a window I would tell you to jump out of it." Am I toxic and do I deserve punishment? (FYI the Vi was 2/14 and I was salty af)

replies.body: Humorous, but yes, that was rude.
That's pretty funny. But yea unfortunately.

Well, saying that definitely did not contribute to the game in a positive or even neutral way. Try to stick to things that benefit game play or nurture a positive environment rather than humor at the expense of other players.
